posts.post_content:
I'm looking for the following cards:

Walter Johnson
Bobby Wallace (No cap, 2 lines)
Tris Speaker
Hal Chase (Left ear)
Bill Dahlen
Ed Karger
Bob Harmon (Left ear shows)

I'm looking for cards in the 1.5-3 range (raw or graded) with the main criteria being no creases across the face of the player and no major paper loss. Thanks for any help.
